cybersecurity_topics.title: Phishing Attacks
cybersecurity_topics.description: Learn to identify and prevent deceptive email attacks

questions.question: What is the primary goal of phishing attacks?
questions.explanation: Phishing attacks primarily aim to steal user credentials and sensitive information.

questions.question: Which email characteristic suggests phishing?
questions.explanation: Phishing emails often create false urgency to pressure victims into quick actions.

questions.question: Best defense against phishing?
questions.explanation: Always verify the sender through independent channels before taking any action.

cybersecurity_topics.title: Malware Defense
cybersecurity_topics.description: Understanding and preventing malicious software attacks

questions.question: What does ransomware do?
questions.explanation: Ransomware encrypts victim files and demands payment for decryption keys.
